summary:
A sexy version of the Forsworn armor with 3 choosable designs (no boots, gloves or head).
So far it\'s only original colors, but I am working on more.
descriptionHtml:
[size=8]Description[/size]
A skimpier/sexier version of the Forsworn armor, and also my first post on the nexus so be nice.
I am going to make more colors and patterns for the armor, so be on the lookout for those.
In the future i might change the boots and gloves, but nothing is planed.

[size=8]Installation[/size]
First look at the picture and chose witch one you want to download A,B or C.
Choose the one you want to download from the downloads list and
use either NMM
Or unpack in your \\Skyrim\\Data folder

[color=red]You cant use more then one at the time, because the one installed last will overwrite the other one.[/color]
[color=green]But you can have them all in the NMM and activate one at the time.[/color]

If you notice anything that looks wrong, pleas inform me and i will get to it as fast as i can.


[size=8]The armor is fully supported by[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12273]Calientes Vanilla Armor for CBBE[/url]


[size=8]Mods used in the pictures[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12273]Calientes Vanilla Armor for CBBE[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13377]Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod CBBE UNP ADEC[/url]
author: tasthedevil
